properties.name: methodDeclaration.includedNodeTypes.location
properties.description: A white list file location to filter ASTNode, must starts with 'classpath:' or 'file:'.It can be omitted.

properties.name: gradleTasks.location
properties.description: A gradle tasks file location to get all dependencies path in a project, must starts with 'classpath:' or 'file:'.It can be omitted.

properties.name: GRADLE_USER_HOME
properties.description: A directory absolute path for GRADLE_USER_HOME.It can be omitted.
